text: Abdulhussain Abdulredha (15 July 1939 - 11 August 2017), ( ) was a Kuwaiti actor, famous and prominent in the Middle East in particular. Abdulredha is best known for his personality of sarcastic humor that made a mockery of the Arab situation comedy template. He was one of the founders of the Arab theater in 1961 and the National Theatre in 1976, as the year 1984 established a special brigade Theatre Arts. On 11 August 2017, Abdulredha died in London aged 78.Prolific actor Abdulredha dies, leaving unforgettable hallmarks on Kuwait arts ==References== ==Other websites== * *Abdulredha at elcinema.com *Gulf Film Festival Honours GCC Film Legends Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Kuwaiti people Category:Movie actors Category:Asian writers Category:Stage actors
title: Abdulhussain Abdulredha
